main.py.purpose: The main entry point of the application, handles CLI parsing and system initialization.

src/config.py.purpose: Application configuration management using Pydantic Settings.

src/paths.py.purpose: Utility functions for managing file paths and directories.

src/file_io.py.purpose: Utility functions for file input/output operations.

src/models.py.purpose: Pydantic models and dataclasses for core system entities and agent responses.

src/prompt_manager.py.purpose: Manages loading and retrieval of prompt templates, including dynamic updates.

src/agent_loader.py.purpose: Loads agent specifications from files into AgentSpec models.

src/agents/base.py.purpose: Defines the abstract base class for all agents.

src/agents/registry.py.purpose: Manages registration and lookup of agent implementations.

src/agents/factory.py.purpose: Factory for creating concrete agent instances from specifications.

src/llms/provider.py.purpose: Defines the abstract interface for Large Language Model providers.

src/llms/client.py.purpose: Initializes and manages LLM client instances.

src/prompt_templates.py.purpose: Loads and renders prompt templates, supporting Jinja2.

src/task_manager.py.purpose: Core module for managing tasks, queues, and status.

src/task_dependencies.py.purpose: Manages task dependencies, including topological sorting and cycle detection.

src/artifacts.py.purpose: Manages the storage, retrieval, and versioning of artifacts.

src/context.py.purpose: Manages the execution context, including environment variables and session data.

src/workflow/state.py.purpose: Manages the state transitions of workflows.

src/session_manager.py.purpose: Manages individual session runs, persisting logs and artifacts.

src/bootstrap.py.purpose: Initializes and configures the entire system.

src/orchestrator.py.purpose: Manages the main workflow orchestration loop, fetching and dispatching tasks.

src/runtime.py.purpose: Central class holding global system state, registries, and core components.

src/cli.py.purpose: Defines and parses command-line interface arguments and subcommands.

src/error_handling.py.purpose: Implements application-wide error handling, including exception wrappers and retry mechanisms.

src/response_parser.py.purpose: Handles parsing and deserialization of various response formats (e.g., JSON, plain text).

src/workflow/planner.py.purpose: Generates and validates workflow execution plans.
